verses.verse: Why do the nations <S%H1471><s%> rage <S%H7283><s%>, And the peoples <S%H3816><s%> meditate <S%H1897><s%> a vain thing <S%H7385><s%>?

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> set <S%H3320><s%> themselves <S%H7336><s%>, And the rulers take counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, Against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and against his anointed <S%H4899><s%>, saying,
Let us break <S%H5423><s%> their bonds <S%H4147><s%> asunder <S%H5423><s%>, And cast away <S%H7993><s%> their cords from us <S%H5688><s%>.
He that sitteth <S%H3427><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%> will laugh <S%H7832><s%>: The Lord <S%H136><s%> will have them in derision <S%H3932><s%>.
Then will he speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, And vex <S%H926><s%> them in his sore displeasure <S%H2740><s%>:
Yet I have set <S%H5258><s%> my king <S%H4428><s%> Upon my holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of the decree <S%H2706><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Thou art my son; This day <S%H3117><s%> have I begotten thee <S%H3205><s%>.

Ask <S%H7592><s%> of me <S%H5414><s%>, and I will give thee the nations <S%H1471><s%> for thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, And the uttermost parts <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for thy possession <S%H272><s%>.
Thou shalt break <S%H7489><s%> them with a rod <S%H7626><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; Thou shalt dash them in pieces <S%H5310><s%> like a potter <S%H3335><s%>'s vessel <S%H3627><s%>.
Now therefore be wise <S%H7919><s%>, O ye kings <S%H4428><s%>: Be instructed <S%H3256><s%>, ye judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Serve <S%H5647><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with fear <S%H3374><s%>, And rejoice <S%H1523><s%> with trembling <S%H7461><s%>.

Kiss <S%H5401><s%> the son <S%H1248><s%>, lest he be angry <S%H599><s%>, and ye perish <S%H6><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, For his wrath <S%H639><s%> will soon be <S%H4592><s%> kindled <S%H1197><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> are all they that take refuge in him <S%H2620><s%>.
